message.content:
cs.LO, cs.PL, cs.DS, cs.SC, cs.SY. 

The paper deals with the synthesis of termination arguments for a specific class of programs called linear lasso programs. This involves the use of algebraic constraint solving and the development of various kinds of ranking functions. Based on this, the most likely sub-category is cs.LO (Logic in Computer Science), which deals with the use of logic and mathematical methods in computer science. Other likely sub-categories include cs.PL (Programming Languages), cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms), cs.SC (Symbolic Computation), and cs.SY (Systems and Control).
